short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View more school and price info on Realtor.ca/HouseSigma/Zealty.ca/Property.ca.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to learn more about a house on sale? MapWand is here to help!

Show more school info on both the map page and the single house listing page:
⭐️ Catchment area
⭐️ Fraser score
⭐️ Fraser rank
⭐️ Current and past academic/performance data
⭐️ You can also filter schools by clicking the extension icon, allowing you to focus on the ones that matter most to you.

Show more price info:
⭐️ Show the Honest Door estimated price

Support multiple websites:
⭐️ Realtor.ca
⭐️ HouseSigma
⭐️ Zealty.ca
⭐️ Property.ca/Condos.ca/MrLOFT.ca

And...
⭐️ Completely free!

How to use: https://youtu.be/lpLDjmJ--dE

Visit our official website: https://mapwand.ca

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us at mapwand.ca@gmail.com.
